channel.title: {317} Massiv3 PK {317} all pking server, now looking for apps
channel.description:
Welcome to the development team of MASSIV3 PK
[b]What Are we looking for?[/b]
Applying for: (choose) Web Designer Graphics Designer Java Coder In-game Moderator (no more positions available) Ventrilo/Teamspeak (no more positions available) Site Moderator (no more positions available) Article Writer (no more positions available) Content Manager (no more positions available) Debugger & Beta Tester (no more positions available) Customer Support (no more positions available)
[b]What is the submission form?[/b]
Name: Age: Programming languages known: Proof: How long have you been in rsps: Anything else: What do you have to contribute to this project: How many hours are you on a day: Name one of your qualities Describe yourself in 2 words: Do you have msn? If so state it here:
[b]About the project:[/b] This server is going to be an all out pking server, if your afraid of facing the enemy dont play (more information coming soon)
[b]What are we planing:[/b] -jad pking -all wepons and emotes -skill capes -pking safe zones (3 of them/not including banks) -training camps (high,med,low) -all skills -pking highscores system -resting pk -webclient -website
[b]Im not into the full working thing, but i will still like to contribute?[/b] if you dont want to do this cold hard work and isnt into all of it, you can still help the server by: -sugesting ideas -spreading the word -keeping active on our website (coming soon) -and many other ways
Thank you for taking your time with this and i hope to see you soon!!
CONTACT ME WITH MSN: gipsey95@hotmail.com

I can apply for any of them but not for the Graphics Design ,
Java coder i am basic but can be helpfull

anyway…

Name: Neev
Age: 17
Programming languages known:Java of corse
Proof: (speak to me privately if needed)
How long have you been in rsps: 3 Years roughly probably more
Anything else: I love creating RSPS and all the add-ons to it! (liek wb site and all)
What do you have to contribute to this project: I really like helping others!
How many hours are you on a day:6-10 (yeah I know, its alot, and i do have a life!)
Name one of your qualities: Very neat and does work to the point and fast and very well!
Describe yourself in 2 words:super nice!
Do you have msn? If so state it here: NeevRSPS@hotmail.co.uk
